author: gorgonzola
title: Wall of Gum - A Novel Virtual Place
description: 移植的dApps即将到来 - Cardano需要本土化的、独一无二的dApps来服务于我们伟大的社区。我们将需要超越DEXs的有趣的dApps!

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal shows a clear path to usability for end users with in 90 days (~13weeks). A "fun Dapp" will attract users to Cardano and create utility for the blockchain by swapping NFTs via the gum wall. The proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal presented a prototype and link to you tube. I would like to see a link to the LinkedIn of the lead developer to learn more about the 7 years programming experience, or a link to a GitHub repository. The proposal has a clear plan to success laid out and I think it will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The project provides a detailed budget breakdown that is clearly connected to a roadmap with milestones to complete. In my opinion, the project will be easy to track and audit.

f6_assessments.q0: This idea seems great and in adequation with the challenge. The main question is how you will promote your idea and make people use your Dapp.
f6_assessments.q1:
The planning seems realistic however you don't clearly explain if you are alone in the team or with other people and what are their experience. I understand that in 3 month you are able to present a v0 version and then you have to update it especially for the UI. The challenge specifically say that after 3 months it is the final version. So after 3 months you should have a version that is nearly finish and fewer modifications. Also if the UI is not finish it will be hard to promote the Dapp after 3 months
The budget seems sufficient and well describe. You really should improve the marking of your product, I am not sure that with 1000$ you will sufficiently promote the Dapp
You should also describe the budget you need to operate and update your product
f6_assessments.q2: The plan with milestone seems ok. Measuring the volume token and quantity of users is also a good ideas.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal seems to have no discernible purpose. it does not add value to the Cardano ecosystem at all. It has no metrics nor any discernible problem or solution given. I watched the video as well and it tells me nothing regarding what this is about. I would strongly disagree that this would have a positive impact on the community.
f6_assessments.q1: There are no Linkedin or FB profiles given so I cannot ascertain the developers experience or capability. He has  indicated any budget breakdown but since there is no understandable purpose of the project, i cannot ascertain whether this budget is reasonable or not. I would strongly disagree that this is feasible.
f6_assessments.q2: The project is auditable based on the fact that there is a month by month roadmap laid out. But the premise of the project is not useful hence I feel that even if auditability is there, the project itself has no value to the ecosystem. Its another NFT project where the NFTs are random blob images. Even not pixel art but just random images.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposal is aligned to the challenge objectives and budget (less than $10k.) The problem details are is a bit too general. Also the solution is not described with details and how the wall of gums will be attractive to the users. You do mentioned that promotion ti user, but having some KPIs and estimations of usage will be helpful to show the impact on the challenge. Overall great idea, but from my experience as mentoring startups more details about the solution are important to understand the benefits and potential.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer mentioned his experience only at the “Relevant experience” section. More information about his experience and links to work or Linkedin would have been helpful. The roadmap and plan are detailed and feasible. As well as the budget. Great that the proposers provide a prototype demo, but as mention before more information about the solution is important to understand also the feasibility. No risks and challenges section included.  Missing some specific KPIs and connection to the budget - for example marketing budget will result in how many users?
f6_assessments.q2: The deliverables are somewhat clear, and the key deliverable will be the public launch of the solution within 10 weeks.  Missing definition of the KPIs like numbers of users and user stat but it is something that could be easily audited. The code will be open source? Info will be shared in Github? Some specification will be helpful.

solution: 口香糖墙是世界上第一个分散的口香糖墙。口香糖球被粘在墙上的槽里，形成NFT。Plutus合约实现了交易。
experience:
- Plutus先锋队第2组成员
- 创建的原型（见视频）用Javascript、Python编写。
- 7年以上的编程经验
